thread.section_title: The 3 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 3 Week Diet | 3weekdiet.com
thread.title: Nina Young
thread.title_full: The 3 Week Diet reviewed by Nina Young

author: Nina Young
title: Nina Young
text: I purchased this diet advice a while ago but wasn't sure I could do it so didn't try. When I actually did I was amazed at how great you feel when fasting, and how I've been struggling for so long without realising that I can do it. It's become a habit. And I've lost weight! Definitely will continue to fast and follow the plan
